measurements_data.source: GIZ and SWEEP-Net. 2014b. "Cost of environmental degradation due to solid waste management practices in Greater Tunis." ["Coût de la dégradation de l'environnement due aux pratiques de gestion des déchets solidesdans le Grand Tunis"]. German Corporation for International Cooperation [Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit GmbH (GIZ)] and Regional Solid Waste Exchange of Information and Expertise Network in Mashreq and Maghreb Countries (SWEEP-Net), on behalf of the German Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ). May.
